description: `SessionUserValidationCommunicationFactory::createSecurityServiceExtender()` in `Spryker\Zed\SessionUserValidation\Communication\SessionUserValidationCommunicationFactory::createSecurityServiceExtender()` contains 2 new statements which violates rule "A `create*()` method in factories must contain exactly 1 `new` statement for instantiation."
Bridges: Method `getCurrentUser()` must have `public function get<DomainEntity>Collection(<DomainEntity>CriteriaTransfer): <DomainEntity>CollectionTransfer` signature.
